mapper.update: UPDATE t_data_mq_reliable_message SET resend_times = resend_times + 1, next_exe_time = GREATEST(next_exe_time, UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000) AS max_value + nextUnixTimestamp, last_consumer_time = UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000, update_time = UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000 WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM t_data_mq_reliable_message WHERE id = {id});
